name: PlayTales
tag_list: kids-app, childrens-app, books, ebooks, education, stories, reading, bedtime, learning
overview:
PlayTales produces award winning apps featuring unlimited interactive books for kids. Over 3 million children are reading PlayTales’ stories worldwide. PlayTales’ interactive books are designed to inspire, educate, and entertain readers ages 1 to 8. Users can enjoy PlayTales’ mobile applications on their iOS or Android devices.

The PlayTales catalog features classic children´s tales such as The Ugly Duckling, Sleeping Beauty, and Puss in Boots, along with new favorites like Pocoyo and Felix the Cat. PlayTales’ Bookshelf also features educational books that help children learn to count, read, spell, add, subtract and more. Stories are available in 8 different languages and new books are added every week.

PlayTales is a wholly-owned subsidiary of Genera Interactive, an internationally based multi-platform mobile entertainment and utilities provider with offices in USA, UK, Spain, Romania, and China.

Newest app: PlayTales Gold Bookstore (iOS and Android)

Features:

-Stories available in 8 languages -New stories every week! -Original animation, sound effects, illustration, and interactive features in every story -Users can access personal library without internet connection -Download as many stories as you like! -Universal subscription between iOS devices -Universal description between Android devices

PlayTales Gold is free for Android users. Individuals can choose to enjoy the app for free or upgrade to a premium subscription. iOs users can pay a low monthly subscription fee or annual fee to get PlayTales Gold.

milestones.description: PlayTales: World Leader of Children’s Interactive Stories Achieves Over 5 Million Monthly Reads
milestones.source_description: PlayTales: World Leader of Children’s Interactive Stories Achieves Over 5 Million Monthly Reads

milestones.description: PlayTales Launches the Ultimate Free Children's Bookstore App for Android Users
